hadiths.text: Narrated Awf ibn Malik al-Ashja'i ; Khalid ibn al-Walid: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) gave judgement that the killer should have what was taken from the man he killed, and did not make this subject to division into fifths

chapter.eng-name: The Spoils(Salab) Are Not Be Subjected To The Khumus
